person.persName: Hamilton Gray, Sr. (Mason County, Kentucky, liquor merchant.)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, liquor merchant. Pennsylvania native. Married to Elizabeth Johnston Gray in Mason County, Kentucky, on January 28, 1840. Father of Hamilton Gray, Jr., Harriet Abby Gray, and Rosa Gray. Liquor merchant in Mason County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned six enslaved persons in Mason County in 1850. Merchant in Mason County in 1860. Employed Ellen Marion as a servant in Mason County 1860. Owned two enslaved people in Mason County in 1860. Liquor merchant in Mason County in 1862.
